articles.title: Hear Goldman Sachs CEO's message to the Biden administration - CNN Video
articles.description: During a CNN interview on New Day, Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon tells CNN's Poppy Harlow what he wants the Biden administration to do to address nationwide economy and inflation concerns.
